topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.0: Undercloud Horizon Dashboard: Settings Tab

body.p: The options on the Settings tab allow changes to the following:
To view the Settings tab, click the Admin icon in the top panel of the Horizon undercloud dashboard and select Settings. The tab appears in the left panel on the dashboard.

section.title: User settings
section.p: This option allows you to change the user settings. To change the settings, do the following:

li.p: From the top panel, click Admin and then select Settings. The Settings Tab is displayed in the left panel with two options User Settings and Change Password.The default is User Settings.
In the User Settings page, from the Language drop-down list, select the desired language. The default is English.
From the Timezone drop-down list, select the time zone. The default is UTC (Universal Coordinated Time).
From Items per Page drop-down list, select the number of lines that you want to display per page. The default is 20 lines per page.
Click Save to save the changes.

section.title: Change Password
section.p: This option allows you to the change the password. Do the following:

li.p: From the top panel, click Admin and then select Settings. The Settings Tab is displayed in the left panel with two options User Settings and Change Password.
Click Change Password to display the Change Password page.
In the Current Password box, enter your current password.
In the New Password box, enter the new password.
In the Confirm Password box, re-enter your new password to confirm.
Click Change to save the changes.
